name: Music Escape (Beta Edition)
detailed_description:
Music Escape (Beta Edition) is a VR Rhythm + Superhero Simulator where you use your weapon of choice and escape the level by disarming bombs, avoiding lasers, all the while trying to achieve the longest combos so you can sit atop the leaderboards. Now featuring Adamantium Claws and Light Nanchakus!

Features

    • Arcade Mode - Pickup and Play, then see where your scores rank on our worldwide leaderboards
    • Map Editor - Create your own Music Maps with our Map Editor: https://2049vr.com/editor
    • Weapons - Adamantium Claw, Light Nunchaku
    • Songs - 10 songs included with fully mapped for both weapon types
    • Leaderboards - test your might against others worldwide


To Music Escape owners:
1. Don't forget to join our Discord to keep track of all the latest updates: https://discord.gg/hnsKu5h
2. The folder for beatmaps you've created should be placed here: ~Music Escape\Music Escape_Data\StreamingAssets\CustomSongs
3. If you're looking for more music, try http://beatsaver.com for community created beatmaps. We are not affiliated with them and we do not condone music piracy so please make sure you own the rights for the music you play.
4. In Nunchaku mode, you can pull the trigger to enable the Special for faster spins. Really helps to string together longer combos.
